text:
Should @deprecate WeakishReference and WeakishReference12 - since we depend on
Java 1.2 anyway as of Ant 1.6, there is no reason to use these classes (and
nothing in Ant apparently does - ComponentHelper uses WeakReference directly).

Could also delete ReferencesTest.java - doesn't really test anything interesting
anymore.

Cf. ant-dev thread "WeakishReference12 - what is it used for?".
creator: jglick@apache.org
jglick@apache.org
